channel.title: BlockWireNews on BlockWire News
channel.description: Recent content in BlockWireNews on BlockWire News

item.title: Ethereum Sees Bearish Options Amid Strong Institutional ETF Demand
item.description: Ethereum faces rising bearish options activity as institutional investors pour billions into spot Ethereum ETFs, highlighting market division in crypto.

item.title: 5 Crypto Frontiers Shaping the Next Decade of Blockchain Innovation
item.description: Explore five emerging crypto frontiers—restaking, DeFi-TradFi fusion, RWAs, ZK tech, and decentralized social—that could transform finance and culture.

item.title: Uniswap Foundation Leads Push for Legal Clarity on DAOs with Treasury
item.description: Uniswap Foundation and 18 crypto groups urge Treasury Secretary Bessent to adopt Wyoming's DUNA framework, clarifying legal status for DAOs in the US.

item.title: BitMine Boosts Ethereum Holdings Above $8B, Now Owns 1.5% of ETH
item.description: BitMine Immersion Technologies raises its Ethereum stash to 1.5% of supply, valued over $8 billion, signaling growing corporate interest in crypto assets.

item.title: Bitcoin, XRP, and Solana Rally on Rate Cut Hopes and Dollar Weakness
item.description: Bitcoin, XRP, and Solana gain on expectations of Fed rate cuts, dollar weakness, and increased market conviction in crypto assets.

item.title: Why Saving Money in Banks Is a Losing Game: The Three Scams Explained
item.description: Banks steal your crypto and dollar yield through hidden fees, inflation, and money supply expansion. Learn why saving in assets and crypto is smarter.

item.title: Privacy Policy

item.title: What is DeFi? A Beginner’s Guide
